resources.string: "- Populate width and height fields with number between 0-999 then press on find kitten to get a kitten image. - Press on add to favourites to save image on your phone. - Click on View my kittens to see all the kitten images saved on your phone. - Press on a kitten from the list to load to screen or delete from device. "
Please enter city name and try again.
Do you want to delete this record from database?

1. This application shows the home screen after showing Splash screen.
2. In home screen user can enter the name of any location whose weather detail he wants to know.
3. As user enter the location name and search, if weather data found on server it takes to next screen to show the details regarding weather.
4. In detail screen there is save button at last by pressing that user can save location name and relavant weather data into local database.
 5. The user can check saved cities with weather data for sepecific date in Favourite screen by pressing the start (Favourite) button from toolbar
 6. User can delete the record from the local database by pressing long on the item in a list.
 7. User can check detail of weather of a specific city normal pressing that item in a list.

"To use this application you need to enter a number between 1 and 1000 to load pictures from the rover that were taken on a certain day.
""
""By pressing on a picture, you will get an expanded version of that picture with the image URL that you can press to take you to the browser.
""
""Once you expand the picture, you can also save it to the database of favorites and for offline viewing.
""
""Finally, you can press the toolbar option to show your selected favorites and remove them."
"Do you want to delete the photo from the rover "
Enter a search term in the input field and press the "Search" button to find articles from The New York Times. Click on an article in the search results to view more details.
